question.analysis: constructed。"network" 和 "construct" 是被动关系,用过去分词 "constructed" 作定语,考查过去分词作定语表被动。

verbComprehensiveQuestion.text: ______ (travel) to this place several times in the past five years, I ______ (impress) by its unique cultural blend.
verbComprehensiveQuestion.analysis: Having traveled;was impressed。第一空,"I" 和 "travel" 是主动关系,且动作先于谓语动词发生,所以用现在分词的完成式 "Having traveled"；第二空,根据语境用一般过去时,"I" 和 "impress" 是被动关系,所以用 "was impressed",考查非谓语动词和一般过去时的被动语态。

question.text: ______ (travel) to this place several times in the past five years, I ______ (impress) by its unique cultural blend.
question.analysis: Having traveled;was impressed。第一空,"I" 和 "travel" 是主动关系,且动作先于谓语动词发生,所以用现在分词的完成式 "Having traveled"；第二空,根据语境用一般过去时,"I" 和 "impress" 是被动关系,所以用 "was impressed",考查非谓语动词和一般过去时的被动语态。

verbComprehensiveQuestion.text: As a journalist, I have dedicated the past three years ______ (documenting) all the social changes I witnessed.
verbComprehensiveQuestion.analysis: to documenting。"dedicate time to doing sth." 为固定结构,所以用 "to documenting",考查固定搭配中动名词的用法。

question.text: As a journalist, I have dedicated the past three years ______ (documenting) all the social changes I witnessed.
question.analysis: to documenting。"dedicate time to doing sth." 为固定结构,所以用 "to documenting",考查固定搭配中动名词的用法。

verbComprehensiveQuestion.text: The astonishing growth of this town, which is purposefully developed to preserve its traditions while embracing modernity, _____ (signify) there are always fresh surprises to uncover here.
verbComprehensiveQuestion.analysis: signifies。主语 "growth" 是单数,根据上下文用一般现在时,谓语用 "signifies",考查一般现在时和主谓一致。

question.text: The astonishing growth of this town, which is purposefully developed to preserve its traditions while embracing modernity, _____ (signify) there are always fresh surprises to uncover here.
question.analysis: signifies。主语 "growth" 是单数,根据上下文用一般现在时,谓语用 "signifies",考查一般现在时和主谓一致。

verbComprehensiveQuestion.text: The classic storytelling method that has been handed down for generations can still ______ (utilize) today to convey profound messages.
verbComprehensiveQuestion.analysis: be utilized。"method" 和 "utilize" 是被动关系,情态动词 "can" 后接 "be utilized",考查情态动词的被动语态。

question.text: The classic storytelling method that has been handed down for generations can still ______ (utilize) today to convey profound messages.
question.analysis: be utilized。"method" 和 "utilize" 是被动关系,情态动词 "can" 后接 "be utilized",考查情态动词的被动语态。

verbComprehensiveQuestion.text: As a young boy, I ____ (aspire) to be an astronaut when I grew up.
verbComprehensiveQuestion.analysis: aspired。根据 "grew" 可知用一般过去时,"aspire" 的过去式是 "aspired",考查一般过去时。

question.text: As a young boy, I ____ (aspire) to be an astronaut when I grew up.
question.analysis: aspired。根据 "grew" 可知用一般过去时,"aspire" 的过去式是 "aspired",考查一般过去时。

verbComprehensiveQuestion.text: ____ (remember) seeing a breathtaking dance performance in Beijing, she decided to learn more about traditional Chinese dance.
verbComprehensiveQuestion.analysis: Remembering。"she" 与 "remember" 是主动关系,用现在分词 "Remembering" 作状语,考查现在分词作状语表主动。

question.text: ____ (remember) seeing a breathtaking dance performance in Beijing, she decided to learn more about traditional Chinese dance.
question.analysis: Remembering。"she"与"remember"是主动关系,用现在分词"Remembering"作状语,考查现在分词作状语表主动。

verbComprehensiveQuestion.text: For centuries, people have created handicrafts ____ (express) their creativity and cultural heritage.
verbComprehensiveQuestion.analysis: to express。考查非谓语动词作目的状语,"to express" 表示制作手工艺品的目的,与真题考点一致。

question.text: For centuries, people have created handicrafts ____ (express) their creativity and cultural heritage.
question.analysis: to express。考查非谓语动词作目的状语,"to express"表示制作手工艺品的目的。

verbComprehensiveQuestion.text: Experts have reacted by ____ (pointing) out that over - use of plastics may cause serious environmental problems.
verbComprehensiveQuestion.analysis: pointing。"by" 是介词,后接动名词 "pointing",考查介词后接动名词的用法。

question.text: Experts have reacted by ____ (pointing) out that over - use of plastics may cause serious environmental problems.
question.analysis: pointing。"by"是介词,后接动名词"pointing",考查介词后接动名词的用法。
